name: pnp-powerplatform-samples-chat-canvas-application
title: Chat Canvas App
shortDescription: Discover a seamless messaging experience with our responsive canvas app – a WhatsApp-inspired platform that allows users to effortlessly exchange messages and voice notes with system users.
longDescription: Discover a seamless messaging experience with our responsive canvas app – a WhatsApp-inspired platform that allows users to effortlessly exchange messages and voice notes with system users.
